text: Jan Krzysztof Bielecki (born 3 May 1951) is a Polish liberal politician and economist. He was Prime Minister of Poland for most of 1991.Dudek, pp. 133-138 Bielecki was president of Bank Pekao between 2003 and 2010 and president of the Polish Institute of International Affairs between 2009 and 2015. ==References== Category:1951 births Category:Living people Category:Prime ministers of Poland Category:Polish economists
title: Jan Krzysztof Bielecki
